name: Tangan Panjang!
description:
Petualangan sang dukun shinobi, Kakashi Hartono melawan robot-robot Kuyang. Gameplay 2D arena-fighter super-cepat dan intens dengan mekanik acak-senjata

Controls:

A, D = Horizontal movement

Space = Jump (2x)

Scroll up = Dash

R = Reload

Left mouse = Light attack

Hold Right mouse = Aim heavy attack

Left mouse while aiming = Heavy attack

UP ARROW to restart room, LEFT/RIGHT ARROW to browse rooms
